name: Absolute Keno - classic keno game
description:
It's KENO time! Play one of the best FREE Keno games! Keno by Absolute Games is free to play with lots of bonuses and coins. See how lucky you are playing Keno anywhere you want as the game can be played offline with no internet connection. WIN BIG! If you guess the right numbers!

ABSOLUTE KENO FEATURES
• FREE keno play - get free coins to play every 4 hours
• CLASSIC keno or Keno keno with a twist
• Great keno odds and HIGH Keno payouts
• FUN keno rooms and mini games
• PLAY TURBO mode for faster game play and quick kino results
• Play OFFLINE or play free online too! You can play anywhere, anytime. Feel just like you're in a Vegas casino!
• PICK 1 to 20 numbers out of 80 numbers and see how many you match!
• AUTOPICK your lucky keno numbers and play consecutive bet chances
• EXPERIENCE the most exciting online keno game available!
• LARGE BET SIZES bet as much or as little as you want

If you love keno and are looking for a fun new keno game that’s free with great keno bonuses, this is the game for you. Whether its keno keno, caveman keno, Vegas casino keno or keno eggs, we have it all!


Keno does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.

Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."
